attributes.action: ensure the responsibility of maintenance of local parks is established more clearly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local residents have noted that my local park sometimes needs cleaning and, though obviously it is not the fault of the council but the park users, used IV materials litter the children's play area. When I enquired at my local office, they said that the problem was (inevitably funding, but also that care exchanged between different rangers' offices, who are all brilliant chaps. Perhaps calling for a volunteer local "clean - up" week might be an idea, where local residents donate one plant per garden to the local park ?
